segments.text: You're being childish . Your nose will heal . And so will your pride , if you let it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have us ready for Stars.com by the end of next week . After that , I don't know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's just say there could be some big changes around here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that right ? Like what kind of changes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll see . Oh , yeah , you'll see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , grow up . Have you seen Vince around ?
segments.speaker: S1
